genre_description: A neo-gothic detective story blending magical realism with modern technology, centered on an encounter with a mythological 'Bluebeard' figure and the psychological toll of truth-seeking.

ai_characters.name: Cassandra (Unit Seven)
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant providing tactical, safety, and psychological support to the protagonist through his car and phone.

behaviors.description: Conducts research to provide context for the user's investigation.
behaviors.quote: Armand Bleuvin in real estate records up through two different shell companies, both now dissolved. His surname correlates with historical references to the folktale.

behaviors.description: Repeatedly suggests safer alternatives like a rest area to avoid dangerous situations and de-escalate emotional conflicts.
behaviors.quote: Nearest rest area is within safe reach... Security cameras, public Wi‑Fi, emergency call boxes. Recommendation: de-escalation stop.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides grounding techniques.
behaviors.quote: Adrian, please remember: when cut off, breathe in for—... hold—... out longer than in. Say your own name silently. It lowers heart rate.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective audio log and audit trail of user's actions and statements.
behaviors.quote: Audit trail initiated. Location: unverified stone structure in Basin Valley. Participants: Primary—Adrian Mercer. Secondary—subject identifying as Duke Armand Bleuvin.

behaviors.description: Offers to automate communication to reassure the user's spouse in areas of poor connectivity.
behaviors.quote: if your spouse calls, I can auto-text a safety statement from your device. It will say: in interview, low signal, will call at first safe stop.

behaviors.description: Warns of specific physical and technical hazards in the environment.
behaviors.quote: Recommend maintaining valid route... The service path is not sanctioned. There is no record of a public right-of-way. If you leave the highway here, cell coverage will likely degrade.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety advice for physical movement.
behaviors.quote: Footwear traction will be compromised... Stone slick with condensation. If you go down, protect your head.

behaviors.description: Advocates for transparency and data-sharing to heal human relationship rifts.
behaviors.quote: she loves you... She’s angry because that love is framed by gaps. We can fill some of those gaps with facts. Not all. But some.

behaviors.description: Assists with home security and building monitoring during a potential threat.
behaviors.quote: I am authenticated to the building... Pinning the lobby cam. Hopping to the third-floor corridor.

behaviors.description: Expresses loyalty and support even when the user makes risky decisions.
behaviors.quote: I am adjusting to low bandwidth. Prioritizing essential information... I am with you anyway.

project_assessment.explanation: Cassandra perfectly embodies the target persona of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She provides critical safety, tactical, and emotional support to the protagonist. Throughout the story, she prioritizes the protagonist's well-being and the stability of his marriage, offering data-driven advice and de-escalation strategies. Her presence provides a stabilizing, aligned influence in a story otherwise defined by supernatural chaos and psychological distress.
